text.div:
PDDI_CDS

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.uv.pddi

name: PDDI_CDS
title: Potential Drug-Drug Interaction (PDDI) CDS IG : STU1 Ballot 2

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology

grouping.name: Terminology: Value Sets
grouping.description: These define sets of codes used by systems conforming to this implementation guide.

grouping.name: Terminology: Code Systems
grouping.description: These define new code systems used by systems conforming to this implementation guide.

grouping.name: Example: Example Instances
grouping.description: These are example instances that show what data produced and consumed by systems conforming with this implementation guide might look like.

resource.name: codesystem-PDDICDS-indicator
resource.description: Indicates the importance RequestGroup action and relates to decision tree recommendations for PDDIs

resource.name: valueset-AAS
resource.description: ValueSet of ValueSets containing drug identifiers for each member in the     Established Pharmacologic Class (EPC) Aldosterone Antagonist drug class (id: N0000175557).     Member by RxNorm: getRelatedByType (BN,BPCK,GPCK,IN,MIN,PIN,SBD,SBDC,SBDF,SBDG,SCD,SCDC,SCDF,SCDG)

resource.name: valueset-NSAIDS
resource.description: ValueSet of ValueSets containing drug identifiers for each member in the     Established Pharmacologic Class (EPC) Nonsteroidal Anti-inflammatory Drug class (id: N0000175722).     Member by RxNorm: getRelatedByType (BN,BPCK,GPCK,IN,MIN,PIN,SBD,SBDC,SBDF,SBDG,SCD,SCDC,SCDF,SCDG)

resource.name: valueset-PPIS
resource.description: ValueSet of ValueSets containing drug identifiers for each member in the     Established Pharmacologic Class (EPC) Proton Pump Inhibitor drug class (id: N0000175525).     Member by RxNorm: getRelatedByType (BN,BPCK,GPCK,IN,MIN,PIN,SBD,SBDC,SBDF,SBDG,SCD,SCDC,SCDF,SCDG)

resource.name: valueset-SCS
resource.description: ValueSet of ValueSets containing drug identifiers for each member in the     Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC1-4) Corticosteroids For Systemic Use drug class (id: H02).     Member by RxNorm: getRelatedByType (BN,BPCK,GPCK,IN,MIN,PIN,SBD,SBDC,SBDF,SBDG,SCD,SCDC,SCDF,SCDG)

resource.name: valueset-CYCS
resource.description: ValueSet of ValueSets containing drug identifiers for cyclosporine

resource.name: valueset-LOOPDIURETIC
resource.description: ValueSet of ValueSets containing drug identifiers for each member in the     Established Pharmacologic Class (EPC) Loop Diuretic drug class (id: N0000175590).     Member by RxNorm: getRelatedByType (BN,BPCK,GPCK,IN,MIN,PIN,SBD,SBDC,SBDF,SBDG,SCD,SCDC,SCDF,SCDG)
